attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Paarden Eiland Used Cars
attributes.description:
2022 FORD RANGER 2.2TDCi XL  S/CAB
This quality used vehicle is at Motus Ford Paarden Eiland, just next to the N1 in Cape Town. We deliver nationwide and will arrange your finance and insurance with ease. We have a full range pre-owned Ford and other popular brands of used vehicles. We would like to give you the best deal on a used car or low mileage demo vehicle.
We also offer value added products such as:
Mechanical Breakdown Warranty
Maintenance and Service Plans
Crystal Fusion Windshield Protection / Reduces Night Glare
Restore it Care – Bodyline and Interior Maintenance
Matrix – Beame Recovery
Smash & Grab Window Protection

attributes.title: 2015 Jeep Compass 2.0 Limited

attributes.description:
If you are looking for a quality Pre-Owned Vehicles then look no further.  Our vehicles go through a 108 -point quality check to ensure that you are getting value for your money.  
Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.  Delivery can be arranged nationwide. Price excludes admin and delivery fee. Finance can be arranged on premises and trade- ins are welcome. We at Motus Mazda Germiston strive for perfection, so that you as the customer can make the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect vehicle to suit your needs so please do take a stroll on our showroom floor. We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.  
You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives, to help with all your vehicle requirements.

attributes.description: At KIA Diepriver we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and a quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA Diep River Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our Dealership.

attributes.description: Balance of 7 year / 200 000 kms Hyundai warranty, KIA PINETOWN we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre- Owned vehicles, belonging to a multinational company who is South Africa's biggest motor group which owns 340 dealers country wide. We will tailor make a finance package that will suit your pocket. Kia Pinetown can offer extended warranties and service plans on all vehicles. attributes.description:
KIA SPORTAGE 2WD 2.0P AT IGNITE+
Stunning 2020 Sportage in an eye catching white. Fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbags, aircon, power steering with controls on steering wheel. Radio with bluetooth and USB port to connect and charge your phone. Reverse camera with rear parking sensors. Automatic transmission and gives a pleasant drive for near and long distances. Visit the KIA Konfidence dealership in Wilropark, Roodepoort and test drive this head turner. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.
